name: 24Colors
description:
24Colors is a Pixel Platformer in a similar style to VVVVVV in graphics.

Features:

  • Basic Platformer Controls (Movement, Jump, Wall jump)
  • Checkpoint System
  • "Trinket" system

Alpha 0.2.9b1:

The level isn't finished yet. So the game is kinda finished feature-wise but not level-wised
